DOC.brief_summary: This study is aimed to determine clinical characteristics of patients with anorexia nervosa and outcome of treatment at Sirirraj Hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Characteristics and Clinical Outcomes of Anorexia Nervosa : Siriraj Hospital Experience
DOC.detailed_description: Data is derived from the medical records
DOC.criteria: children and adolescents with newly diagnosed anorexia nervosa in Siriraj Hospiatl according to DSM IV criteria treated by multidisciplinary teams e.g. pediatricians specialized in nutrition and psychology and psychologist
